title: Still late to champion select after accepting ques
body:
Hi Riot, 

I have sent in a ticket and report with logs from the hextech repair tool when I first reported my issues of the freezing when going into champion select and have done a complete fresh full re-install of the game as you guys told me it would be a work around of the issue but I am still receving that issue EVEN after a full fresh re-install...

Got any other ideas?

replies.body:
Damn, sorry to hear you're still having issues! :/

If you're experiencing the known issue in the Beta Client during the transition to Champion Select, then the 100% workaround is to use the Legacy Client (from login) for now: 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Some players have also mentioned that collapsing their friends list groups **before** queueing up for a match will also bypass the issue:

https://imgur.com/a/GJulP

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=cealnWun,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-28T03:35:41.136+0000)
>
> Damn, sorry to hear you're still having issues! :/

> Some players have also mentioned that collapsing their friends list groups **before** queueing up for a match will also bypass the issue:
> 
> https://imgur.com/a/GJulP

> Let me know if you have any further issues with this.

It's not an entirely black screen its that it freezes for about 10-20 seconds and then loads champion select properly but there's the rare occasion where I miss my ban phase because champion select did not load in time... I've tried all work arounds and nothing is fixing the issue. Not even a complete full reinstall of everything... if you have any other ideas come back to me when yah do cause until then I'm just not going to play because it is a waste of my time in trying to do so when the client is being a pain in my ass...

We deployed a hotfix last night that should have resolved this for you. If you're still experiencing issues with this, I recommend submitting a support ticket with your Client logs, using the instructions in our [**Pinned Post.**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/MihNFhcV-updated-black-screen-during-champion-select-beta-client)
